text: Ara paksantare yadi kono bipada tadera pakarata tadera hata ya agabariyeche sejan'ya tahale tara balate parata -- ''amadera prabhu! Kena tumi amadera kache kono rasula patha'o ni tahale to amara tomara nirdesabali anusarana karate paratama ebam amara muminadera antarbhukta hate paratama?â€™â€™
